metadata.title: CVE-2024-36880 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: qca: add missing firmware sanity checksAdd the missing sanity checks when parsing the firmware files beforedownloading them to avoid accessing and corrupting memory beyond thevmalloced buffer.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
